entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He had gone very white and was shocked to learn that his parents died in a car crash.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is angry and outraged when Harry learns about his parents' death. He is worried and anxious about telling Harry the truth.

entities.name: lily potter
entities.description: Lily Potter is Harry's mother who died in a car crash.

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is Harry's father who died in a car crash.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who told Hagrid that there might be trouble getting hold of Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He had gone very white and was shocked to learn that his parents died in a car crash.

relationships.description: Hagrid was told by Dumbledore that there might be trouble getting hold of Harry.
Hagrid told Harry Potter the truth about his parents' death.
